title: "GoingFull AP On Tanks is Fun! xD xD xD"
body: What's fun about getting popped three seconds into every team-fight and being an inferior mage?

replies.body:
{{champion:54}} 
This as full ap is most cheesey bull shit ever -.-
And against some champions you can make it work surprisingly high up the ladder.
The fun is popping the entire enemy team because tanks are broken
